00023 namespace DL 
00024   {
00028   template < class ReturnType , 
00029        class Param1     ,
00030        class Param2     ,
00031        class Param3     
00032      >
00033   class Functor3 : public DelegateBase 
00034   {
00035   ReturnType (*m_function)(Param1,Param2,Param3);
00036   Param1 m_val1;
00037   Param2 m_val2;
00038   Param3 m_val3;
00039   Functor3(){}
00040   public:
00041   Functor3(ReturnType (*function)(Param1,Param2,Param3),
00042     Param1 val1 = Param1(),
00043     Param2 val2 = Param2(),
00044     Param3 val3 = Param3()):
00045     m_function(function),
00046     m_val1(val1),m_val2(val2),m_val3(val3)
00047     {}
00048   virtual ~Functor3(){}
00049   void operator()()
00050   {
00051     (*m_function)(m_val1,m_val2,m_val3);
00052   }
00053   ReturnType operator()(Param1 val1,Param2 val2,Param3 val3)
00054   {
00055    return (*m_function)(val1,val2,val3);
00056   }
00057   void Invoke()
00058   {
00059     (*m_function)(m_val1,m_val2,m_val3);
00060   }
00061   ReturnType Invoke(Param1 val1,Param2 val2,Param3 val3)
00062   {
00063    return (*m_function)(val1,val2,val3);
00064   }
00065   };
00066   
00067   //######################################################################################################
00068   template < class ReturnType , class Param1    , 
00069              class Param2     , class Param3
00070      >
00071   DelegateObj create_delegate( ReturnType(*Meth)(Param1,Param2,Param3), 
00072                 Param1 & param1 , Param2 & param2 , Param3 & param3 )
00073   {
00074   return DelegateObj(new Functor3<ReturnType,Param1,Param2,Param3>
00075     (Meth,param1,param2,param3));
00076   }
